metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6634 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The display drivers in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Z allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 24163261.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Abhishek Arya, Oliver Chang, and Martin Barbella

notes.Note: seth-arnold> The linked patch only fixes a compilation issue; the change message refers to 6e69a5311599cc90b654031e93b272017169f1e0 as the fix.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
